channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The inevitable meeting
item.description: When the person you could have been meets the person you are becoming, is it going to be a cause for celebration or heartbreak? This is something we m...

item.title: It just barely works
item.description: This is the story of every new software innovation, and in fact, just about everything engineers have ever created. The first Wright Bros. plane just ...

item.title: Everything costs
item.description: But not all costs are the same. There are three kinds of costs that people get confused about, but understanding them, really understanding them–in yo...

item.title: Little dents
item.description: Deciding to fix a big dent in a car isn’t perplexing. It’s an easy choice. There’s a huge dent, get it fixed. It’s the little dents that are a dilemma...

item.title: Microsoft Announces Numerous New AI Tools Dedicated To Healthcare
item.description: These tools aim to unlock a new set of capabilities for healthcare.

item.title: Apple Watch: Earn A New Badge With Mindfulness Minutes For Mental Health Day
item.description: Apple has just created a new badge for Apple Watch users, available for one day only.

item.title: What's Ahead For Holiday Deals, Tech-Enabled Gifting, And Experiences
item.description: After years of economic uncertainty and holiday spending fatigue, consumers are itching for a less stressful holiday shopping season.

item.title: Three Things Every Small Business Must Know About AI
item.description: Like any new technology, AI can seem overwhelming at first, but despite the challenges, the potential payoffs make it well worth the extra effort.

item.title: Facing the future
item.description: The Tofflers explained that Future Shock kicks in when the world changes faster than we’re ready for. We react instead of respond, and often shut down...

item.title: Intel Reveals Core Ultra 200 Desktop Processors: Bad News For AMD?
item.description: Intel has finally announced its Arrow Lake Core Ultra 200 desktop processors - the successors to the current 14th Gen models.
